name: Final Nights
description:
Years after the incident that caused our favorite restaurant to be shut down, it's reborn and not as good as it used to be. However it's a rapid decline in visitors due to supposed hauntings has doomed the restaurant once again, as a nightguard, the ghosts have now followed you home, yet this one is different.

Is it trying to take your soul? Or is it trying to tell you something?

Defend yourself, and try to get rid of this curse in Final Nights!
